question.text:
Drie van de onderstaande zinnen (2, b, câ€š d, e, of f) zijn uit de tekst
weggelaten (zie 4-1, 4-2, 4-3)
Geef bij elke plaats aan welke zin daar hoort

Noteer de [etter van de zin achter elk nummer op het antwoordblad
Let op: er blijven drie zinnen over.

A Many disagree about whether or not cutting down on meat and dairy
products is better for the environment
B No risk of subsidizing industries you disapprove of.
C Questioning someone's beliefs can be tricky
D Sticking rigidly to your principles leads to an increase in business
E That's a rationale for letting it slide
F You can contribute by making a case for your views and getting others
to join your cause
